verses.verse: It shall happen, <S%H1697><s%> when all these things have come <S%H935><s%> on you, <S%H1293><s%> the blessing and the curse, <S%H7045><s%> which I have set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H7725><s%> and you shall call them to mind <S%H3824><s%> among all the nations, <S%H1471><s%> where Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has driven you, <S%H5080><s%>

and shall return <S%H7725><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and shall obey <S%H8085><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%> according to all that I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day, <S%H3117><s%> you and your children, <S%H1121><s%> with all your heart, <S%H3824><s%> and with all your soul; <S%H5315><s%>

that then Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will turn <S%H7725><s%> your captivity, <S%H7622><s%> and have compassion <S%H7355><s%> on you, <S%H7725><s%> and will return and gather <S%H6908><s%> you from all the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> where Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has scattered you. <S%H6327><s%>

If your outcasts <S%H5080><s%> are in the uttermost <S%H7097><s%> parts of the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> from there will Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gather <S%H6908><s%> you, <S%H3947><s%> and from there he will bring you back:

and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will bring <S%H935><s%> you into the land <S%H776><s%> which your fathers <S%H1><s%> possessed, <S%H3423><s%> and you shall possess <S%H3423><s%> it; <S%H3190><s%> and he will do you good, and multiply <S%H7235><s%> you above your fathers. <S%H1><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will circumcise <S%H4135><s%> your heart, <S%H3824><s%> and the heart <S%H3824><s%> of your seed, <S%H2233><s%> to love <S%H157><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> with all your heart, <S%H3824><s%> and with all your soul, <S%H5315><s%> that you may live. <S%H2416><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will put <S%H5414><s%> all these curses <S%H423><s%> on your enemies, <S%H341><s%> and on those who hate <S%H8130><s%> you, <S%H7291><s%> who persecuted you.

You shall return <S%H7725><s%> and obey <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> all his commandments <S%H4687><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day. <S%H3117><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will make you plenteous <S%H3498><s%> in all the work <S%H4639><s%> of your hand, <S%H3027><s%> in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your body, <S%H990><s%> and in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your livestock, <S%H929><s%> and in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your ground, <S%H127><s%> for good: <S%H2896><s%> for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will again <S%H7725><s%> rejoice <S%H7797><s%> over you for good, <S%H2896><s%> as he rejoiced <S%H7797><s%> over your fathers; <S%H1><s%>

if you shall obey <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> to keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> and his statutes <S%H2708><s%> which are written <S%H3789><s%> in this book <S%H5612><s%> of the law; <S%H8451><s%> if you turn <S%H7725><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> with all your heart, <S%H3824><s%> and with all your soul. <S%H5315><s%>
For this commandment <S%H4687><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day, <S%H3117><s%> it is not too hard <S%H6381><s%> for you, <S%H7350><s%> neither is it far off.

It is not in heaven, <S%H8064><s%> that you should say, <S%H559><s%> "Who shall go up <S%H5927><s%> for us to heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and bring <S%H3947><s%> it to us, <S%H8085><s%> and make us to hear it, <S%H6213><s%> that we may do it?"

Neither is it beyond <S%H5676><s%> the sea, <S%H3220><s%> that you should say, <S%H559><s%> "Who shall go <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5676><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> for us, <S%H3947><s%> and bring it to us, <S%H8085><s%> and make us to hear it, <S%H6213><s%> that we may do it?"
But the word <S%H1697><s%> is very <S%H3966><s%> near <S%H7138><s%> to you, <S%H6310><s%> in your mouth, and in your heart, <S%H3824><s%> that you may do it. <S%H6213><s%>
Behold, <S%H7200><s%> I have set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%> life <S%H2416><s%> and good, <S%H2896><s%> and death <S%H4194><s%> and evil; <S%H7451><s%>

in that I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%> to love <S%H157><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> to walk <S%H3212><s%> in his ways, <S%H1870><s%> and to keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> and his statutes <S%H2708><s%> and his ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> that you may live <S%H2421><s%> and multiply, <S%H7235><s%> and that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> may bless <S%H1288><s%> you in the land <S%H776><s%> where you go <S%H935><s%> in to possess it. <S%H3423><s%>

But if your heart <S%H3824><s%> turns away, <S%H6437><s%> and you will not hear, <S%H8085><s%> but shall be drawn away, <S%H5080><s%> and worship <S%H7812><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> and serve them; <S%H5647><s%>

I denounce <S%H5046><s%> to you this day, <S%H3117><s%> that you shall surely <S%H6><s%> perish; <S%H6><s%> you shall not prolong <S%H748><s%> your days <S%H3117><s%> in the land, <S%H127><s%> where you pass over <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> to go <S%H935><s%> in to possess it. <S%H3423><s%>

I call <S%H5749><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%> to witness <S%H5749><s%> against you this day, <S%H3117><s%> that I have set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you life <S%H2416><s%> and death, <S%H4194><s%> the blessing <S%H1293><s%> and the curse: <S%H7045><s%> therefore choose <S%H977><s%> life, <S%H2416><s%> that you may live, <S%H2421><s%> you and your seed; <S%H2233><s%>

to love <S%H157><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> to obey <S%H8085><s%> his voice, <S%H6963><s%> and to cling <S%H1692><s%> to him; <S%H2416><s%> for he is your life, and the length <S%H753><s%> of your days; <S%H3117><s%> that you may dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers, <S%H1><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> to Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> to give them. <S%H5414><s%>
